cobblemonextendedbattleui.config.title: Cobblemon Extended Battle UI Settings
cobblemonextendedbattleui.config.enableT: Show Pokemon team indicators under health bars during battle
cobblemonextendedbattleui.config.teamInd: Allow dragging team indicators to reposition them. When disabled, indicators stay in their default positions.
cobblemonextendedbattleui.config.enableB: Show panel with weather, terrain, field conditions, and stat stages
Show custom battle log widget with damage percentages
cobblemonextendedbattleui.config.enableM: Show tooltips with type effectiveness when hovering over moves. Disable if using Cobblemon Move Inspector.
cobblemonextendedbattleui.config.showTer: Display Tera Type in Pokemon tooltips when known
cobblemonextendedbattleui.config.showSta: Display Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, and Sp. Def in Pokemon tooltips (Speed is always shown)
cobblemonextendedbattleui.config.showBas: Always show crit rate in move tooltips. When disabled, only shows crit rate for high-crit moves or when boosted by items/abilities.
